From how I understand this, if we do not provide a yaml file, we still use these `enabled` variables:

```
<xacro:unless value="$(arg yaml_sensor_generation)">
    <!-- Add a front camera -->
    <xacro:if value="$(arg camera_enabled)">
        <xacro:wamv_camera name="front_camera" y="0.3" x="0.75" P="${radians(15)}" />
    </xacro:if>
```

However, by removing them from here, they are all left default=false. So I think we should either keep these here and still use them if a yaml file is not given OR remove all of these `enabled` variables entirely from here and the .urdf.xacro file.
